name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, adept in building high-performance applications leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **REST API** integration. Proficient in cloud technologies with a strong background in **Azure** and **AWS**, I excel at developing scalable solutions that incorporate advanced AI functionalities. My technical acumen includes utilizing **Git** for version control, delivering innovative solutions using tools like **N8N**, **ChatGPT**, **Claude**, and **Cursor** to enhance system capabilities.

In the healthcare and financial sectors, I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms with a focus on AI/ML integration for enhanced real-time analytics and intelligent automation. My experience with **microservices architecture**, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation ensures robust, secure applications that comply with standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am committed to ongoing problem-solving and creativity, driving project goals with empathy and proactivity.
